item.title: Give mod command problems
item.dc:creator: @Jeremy368 Jeremy368
item.description:
@Jeremy368 wrote:

I made this code based off a few other codes and i cant seem to get it working

[code]
if (command.startsWith(“pr1”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jeremy”)) {
String name = command.substring(3);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];

            c.playerRights = 1;
            c.savemoreinfo();
            c.savechar();
list.remove(connectedFrom);
            c.disconnected = true;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (name + " is now a Mod");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
}[/code]

It just keeps sending me this message “sendMessage(name + " either isn’t online or doesn’t exist”);" so any one know how i can fix this/

Read full topic
